MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the EH22 postcode area of Dalkeith, affecting properties in John Humble Street and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 6:55PM. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of difficulties on site and further investigations are now required and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3.00am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:17 PM on Sunday, 11 October 2020.
